log-in-dialog-prelogin-t-and-c-1: By clicking continue I agree to
log-in-dialog-reset-password.title: Reset user password
log-in-dialog-reset-password.not-valid: The code is invalid, please enter an 8-digit code.
log-in-dialog-reset-password.not-valid-m: The code length is 8 characters and contains numbers only.
log-in-dialog-reset-password.explain-2: an 8-digit code. Please enter the code to reset your password.
log-in-dialog-withmail-explanation: Enter your email address to login or register.
log-in-dialog-mailexist-mail-not-valid: Please enter a valid email address.
log-in-dialog-mailnotexist-explanation-1: We are creating a new user for -
log-in-dialog-mailexist-password-not-val: Password must contain at least 10 characters.
Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number.
log-in-dialog-mailexist-password-not-mat: The passwords you created do not match. You can use the 'eye' icon to display the characters.
legal-tandc-p-1: Welcome to Onde Ltd. - Social automatic printing house ("Company" or "We"). We hope you enjoy browsing the website at www.onde.co.il or at: www.onde.io ("Website") and using the services offered by the company.
legal-tandc-p-2: Please read these terms of use carefully. These terms of use, together with the "Privacy Policy" attached to them, regulate the use of the website and constitute a legally binding agreement between you and the company. The terms of use instructions will apply to any use you make of the website and services. By browsing and/or using the website and/or using the services, you agree that you are subject to these terms of use and all obligations that apply to you as a website user and/or service user under these terms of use.
legal-tandc-p-2.5: If you do not agree with these terms of use, please refrain from using the website and/or services.
legal-tandc-p-3: For reading convenience, the terms of use are formulated in masculine form, but refer to both men and women. Everything said in singular should be read as if it were also said in plural, as appropriate and vice versa.
legal-pp-p-1: Eazix Ltd. ("Company" or "We") respects your privacy when using the website. The current privacy policy of the website is an integral part of the website's terms of use which can be found at:
legal-pp-p-3: Since the privacy policy may change from time to time, it is recommended that you update yourself on the policy document from time to time.
delete-order.title: Cancel Order
delete-order.explain: Are you sure you want to permanently cancel order number
delete-order.success: Your order has been canceled successfully!
delete-user.title: Delete User
delete-user.explain: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the user from email
delete-cart.title: Delete Shopping Cart
delete-cart.explain-cart: Are you sure you want to delete the entire cart? This action cannot be undone.
delete-cart.explain-item: Are you sure you want to delete "{{itemName}}" from the cart?
my-orders.no-orders: You haven't created your first order yet...
my-orders.contact-us-for-help-explain: Please contact us via WhatsApp and we will be happy to help.
my-orders.no-img-src-explain: Due to some problem in the system, the image source does not exist and therefore this image cannot be displayed.
my-profile.title: My Profile
my-profile.username.error: Username must contain at least 3 characters.
my-profile.permanent-discount.error: Discount percentage must be between 0 and 100
my-profile.payment-per-lap-explain: This user pays on account at the end of each month.
phone-dialog-explain: The phone number will be used by us for service purposes only, and not for advertising purposes.
my-cc-no-credit-info: No payment method exists in the system.
my-cc-no-credit-info-su: Does not exist and no payment method is needed for a system administrator user.
my-cc-set-credit-info-explain: To set a new payment method, enter the card details and click "Save card details".
my-cc-chainge-credit-info-explain: To change payment method, enter the new card details and click "Save card details".
my-cc-card-cvv-explain: Enter the 3 digits appearing on the back of the credit card.
my-cc-card-holder-name.error: Cardholder name must contain at least 3 characters.
my-cc-card-customer-name.error: Name for invoice issuance must contain at least 3 characters.
my-cc-card-company-id: Company ID or business number for invoices
my-cc-card-company-id.error: Company ID is invalid - please enter a valid company ID or delete this field.
my-cc-delete-card-for-good: Delete this payment method permanently from our systems
copy-scan.title: Copy and scan documents
copy-scan.alert.occupied: The scanning device is in use by another user, please wait until the device is available.
copy-scan.alert.scanning: The scanning device is scanning a previous file of yours, please wait for the scanning process to complete.
copy-scan.copy-explain: Scan a document and print a copy of it.
copy-scan.scan-explain: Scan a document and receive the scanned file by email.
copy-scan.scan-enter-email: To which email address should the scanned file be sent?
copy-scan.put-paper-in-scanner: Open the printer's scanning tray, place one document on it and close the cover, and only then click the "OK" button.
copy-scan.status.waiting: The scanner is preparing to scan your document.
copy-scan.status.scanning: Your document is being scanned right now.
copy-scan.status.waiting.sub: Please wait... we will update shortly...
copy-scan.status.scanning.sub: Please wait for the scanning process to complete...
copy-scan.status.scanning.sub.explain: This process may take between 20 seconds and 60 seconds.
copy-scan.status.finished: Your document has been scanned successfully!
copy-scan.status.finished.copy: It will appear in your printing table shortly.
copy-scan.status.finished.copy-sub: After the file finishes processing, you can set a paper type for it and send it to print.
copy-scan.status.finished.scan: and it will be sent to your email inbox shortly.
copy-scan.status.not-occupied: The scanner is available for your use!
q-and-a.1.title: How to print at Eazix?
q-and-a.1.content-1: Eazix is an automatic and quality printing system available to you at any time and immediately.
q-and-a.2.title: How to edit a file for printing?
q-and-a.2.content-1: Editing a file for printing correctly is very important if you want to achieve maximum print quality.
q-and-a.3.title: What are the operating hours of the branches?
q-and-a.3.content-1: The operating hours of the branches depend on the educational institution or business where the printer is located, so you should contact the institution or business directly to find out the opening hours.
q-and-a.4.title: Directions to branches
q-and-a.4.content-1: To get accurate directions to a branch, you are welcome to contact our smart bot on WhatsApp
q-and-a.5.title: What types of paper are there?
q-and-a.5.content-1: Paper types vary between branch and branch and between printer and printer
error-content-unknown_error: Due to an unknown problem in the system, the system is not responding. Please refresh the browser and contact us via WhatsApp if the problem persists.
error-title-Auth_faild-Email_dosnt_exist: Email address does not exist in the system
error-content-Auth_faild-Email_dosnt_exi: The email address you entered does not exist in our system.
error-content-Auth_faild-Wrong_password: The password you entered in the system is incorrect, please enter the correct password.
error-content-Auth_faild-Invalid_auth_cr: Your user login credentials are invalid.
error-content-Create_user_faild-Invalid_: Due to some problem with the registration details, we were unable to create a new user.
error-content-Get_user-Fetching_user_fai: Due to some problem, we were unable to import the user details from the server.
error-content-Update_user-Not_authorized: Due to some problem, we were unable to update the user details on the server.
error-content-Delete_user-Deleting_user_: Due to some problem, we were unable to delete the user from the server.
error-title-Delete_user-Deleting_user_no: You do not have system permission to delete users
error-content-Delete_user-Deleting_user_: You do not have system permission to delete users from the system. If you should have user deletion permissions, please contact customer service.
error-content-Orders_Fetching-orders-fai: Due to some problem in our systems, we were unable to import your orders list from the server.
error-content-Check_auth-Auth-Faild-toke: Due to some problem, we were unable to verify your user details, please log out and log back into the website.
